text: Robert W. Fri (November 16, 1935 – October 10, 2014) was an American administrator who served as the Deputy Administrator of the United States Environmental Protection Agency from 1971 to 1973. He died of lung cancer on October 10, 2014, in Bethesda, Maryland at age 78. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2014 deaths Category:People of the United States Environmental Protection Agency
title: Robert W. Fri
